text: <@U0KM61BCP> so I need to push this to 0.6 right? <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/1129/>

as for Manish’s suggestion for 0.6, of that I am unconvinced
we are trying to keep v0.6 stable
we _may_ cut another with some SDK fixes we found
okay then I would vote for convergence. tomorrow I will try to bring it to there
ok
<@U0KM61BCP> 1169 and 1167 bring the baseimage repo in sync with what was (hopefully the last) manual artifact upload in atlas/dockerhub
<https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/1169/>
if this is approved, ill tag 1167 with “v0.1.0” and hopefully any releases after this may be delivered exclusively by the pipeline
